translation.en: ♪ I say you can't bеcause I lost it When I knew you were alive ♪ ♪ I'll go anywhere you wanna go ♪
translation.es: BEN HOPE ESTOY ANSIOSO POR VERTE. BESO.
BEN HOPE ¿PODEMOS VERNOS EN EL RECREO?
Feliz Año Nuevo, chicos de Truham.

translation.en: Uh, don't forget there'll now be students from all school years
translation.es: No olviden que ahora habrá alumnos de todos los años

translation.en: in your new form groups. I hope you enjoy getting to know
translation.es: en las salas de asistencia. Así conocerán… NUEVA SALA: B25

translation.en: some fresh faces in registration each day.
translation.es: …algunas caras nuevas cuando den el presente.

translation.en: Oh! If it isn't Charlie Spring. Happy New Year.
Where did I put you on the seating plan?
He's in Year 11, so only one year older than you.
translation.es: Está en onceavo año, es solo un año mayor que tú.

translation.en: One of the rugby boys too, I think. I'm sure you'll get along swimmingly.
translation.es: Creo que juega al rugby. Seguro se llevarán de maravilla.

translation.en: Or you can just sit in silence for the rest of the year.
translation.es: O pueden sentarse en silencio el resto del año.

translation.en: It really doesn't affect me in any way whatsoever.
translation.es: No me afecta en lo absoluto.
- Perdón por lo de antes. - No hay problema.

translation.en: I missed your face so much.
Really? Did you have a good Christmas?
Yeah, it was all right. You?
Yeah. Yeah, it was good. Um…
My whole family was around on Christmas day and then…
translation.es: Vino toda la familia en Navidad y…

translation.en: - Still don't tell anyone about this. - Oh. Um…
translation.es: Aún no le cuentes a nadie.

translation.en: - Are you going that way? - Yeah. Maths.
Are you literally doing your homework while walking to your lesson?
translation.es: ¿En serio haces la tarea mientras vas a clases?

translation.en: That makes me sound way cooler than I actually am.
translation.es: No tengo tanta onda como crees.

translation.en: Do you want me to do that for you?
- No, I'm good. - I can tell you the answer.
translation.es: - No, gracias. - Te digo la respuesta.

translation.en: If you're stuck I can just… Let me just…
Why are you talking to me? I don't know who you are.
translation.es: ¿Por qué me hablas? No sé quién eres.

translation.en: Uh, yeah. He's in my year.
translation.es: Sí. Está en el mismo año que yo.
Le compré una bebida a Elle.

translation.en: - Didn't you do that yesterday? - Yes, Isaac. Yes, I did.
translation.es: - ¿No lo hiciste ayer? - Sí, Isaac, lo hice.
- Elle no está aquí. - Ya sé.

translation.en: - She's not been here all week. - I know. I keep forgetting.
translation.es: - No ha venido en toda la semana. - Siempre lo olvido.

translation.en: Tao, you're allowed to miss her.
It's better that she's at an all- girls school.
translation.es: Es mejor que vaya a una escuela de chicas.

translation.en: Mr. Reed was still refusing to call her Elle.
translation.es: El señor Reed se negaba a llamarla Elle.

translation.en: Yeah. Mr. Reed's a massive transphobe.
translation.es: El señor Reed es muy transfóbico.

translation.en: There used to be four of us, now there's only three.
The guy you sit next to in form?
- Who? - He looks like a golden retriever.
He doesn't look like a golden retriever.
I can't believe you've been sat next to rugby king Nick Nelson.
translation.es: Increíble que te sientes junto a Nick Nelson, el rey del rugby.

translation.en: What are you going to talk about?
Charlie, you don't have a tissue, do you?
- It's not coming off. - You're gonna be blue forever.
translation.es: - No se quita. - Quedarás azul para siempre.

translation.en: Looks like I'm wearing blue gloves!
You can make it the new school fashion.
translation.es: Hazlo la nueva moda de la escuela.

translation.en: Or I'll pretend it's a tattoo.
translation.es: O fingiré que es un tatuaje.

translation.en: - What? Why? - Why? Look at them.
We are a group. No, a trio of borderline outcasts.
translation.es: Somos un grupo… No, un trío de excluidos.

translation.en: He is the star player on the rugby team,
translation.es: Él es la estrella del equipo de rugby

translation.en: and he's friends with a bunch of loud, gross Year 11s
translation.es: y es amigo de chicos gritones y asquerosos de onceavo año,

translation.en: who are like the guys who bullied you last year.
translation.es: como los que te agredían el año pasado.

translation.en: I bet he's a whole different person when he's with his bro dude friends.
translation.es: Seguro que es totalmente distinto cuando está con sus amigotes.

translation.en: Lunch ends in five minutes, girls.
translation.es: El almuerzo está por terminar. ESCUELA DE CHICAS HIGGS

translation.en: We don't make exceptions, even for new students.
translation.es: No hacemos excepciones ni con las alumnas nuevas.

translation.en: You can have this back from reception at the end of the day.
translation.es: Búscalo en recepción al final del día.

translation.en: You know I'm sorry about ignoring you yesterday.
It's quite a while since you've hidden in here at lunch.
translation.es: Hacía tiempo que no te escondías aquí para almorzar.

translation.en: No bullies I need to sort out again?
Actually, there is kind of someone.
- Okay… - I don't even know if…
I don't think he even thinks we're boyfriends anyway.
translation.es: Me parece que él no cree que seamos novios.

translation.en: He doesn't even like people seeing us talk to each other in the corridors.
translation.es: Ni siquiera le gusta que nos vean hablando en los pasillos.

translation.en: He pretends like he doesn't know who I am.
But then when it's just us two he's fine.
translation.es: Pero cuando estamos solos, es bueno.

translation.en: Well, have you talked to him about how that makes you feel?
Maybe you should talk to him then?
What do you want me to say? Break up with him?
- I don't know. - Well, do you want to break up with him?
I can't solve your problems for you, Charlie.
translation.es: No puedo resolverte los problemas, Charlie.

translation.en: What about your friends, have you talked to them about it?
- They wouldn't get it. - Why not?
It's better to be honest about your feelings in the long run.
translation.es: A la larga, es mejor ser sincero.

translation.en: I know. It took you three months to tell me you were being bullied.
translation.es: Ya sé. Tardaste tres meses en decirme que te molestaban.

translation.en: - I'd never lie to you, don't worry. - Okay.
- We will. If you're nice. - Never mind then.
I broke up with my boyfriend.
Hypothetically, what sort of boy do you want to go out with?
translation.es: Hipotéticamente, ¿con qué clase de chico quieres salir?

translation.en: One who doesn't mind people seeing us talk to each other would be nice.
translation.es: Uno al que no le moleste que nos vean hablando.

translation.en: or do you want an opposites attract thing?
translation.es: o algo como los opuestos se atraen?

translation.en: I don't think I can afford to be that specific, to be honest.
translation.es: No puedo darme el lujo de ser tan selectivo.
¿Cómo sería el chico de tus sueños?

translation.en: Just someone I can have a laugh with.

translation.es: Y que le guste estar conmigo.

translation.en: I'd probably just settle for someone tall.
We've been doing this all term and no one's beaten Charlie's time yet.
translation.es: Hemos hecho esto todo el semestre y nadie ha podido ganarle a Charlie.

translation.en: Charlie's leaving you all in the dust!
So, um, I had something I wanted to ask you.
Charlie… I wanted to tell you that I'm gay too.
translation.es: Charlie, quería decirte que yo también soy gay.

translation.en: And I'm in love with you.
Do you want to go out with me?
I want to be with you forever.
Do you want to join the rugby team?
We have enough players for the team
but we're not allowed to actually play against other teams without a reserve.
translation.es: pero no podemos jugar contra otros equipos sin una reserva.

translation.en: And I saw you run in PE and you're, like, really fast.
translation.es: Te vi en educación física, eres muy rápido.

translation.en: So… I thought you might be interested.
translation.es: Creí que tal vez te interesaría.

translation.en: I don't really know how to play.
That's fine. I can teach you.
Aren't I a bit small and weak to be a rugby player?
translation.es: ¿No soy pequeño y debilucho para ser jugador de rugby?

translation.en: We're just a school team, you know. It's not that serious.
translation.es: Somos un equipo escolar, no es para tanto.

translation.en: So you're saying I am small and weak?
So, do you want to join?
It's literally just another silly crush.
It's not a crush. I don't just fall for any guy who's nice to me.
translation.es: No es eso. No me enamoro de cada chico que me trata bien.

translation.en: And you're sure you want to spend a whole hour
translation.es: ¿Seguro que quieres pasar una hora entera

translation.en: - with giant, moronic, rugby lads? - Yes.
translation.es: - con chicos gigantes e idiotas? - Sí.

translation.en: - Isn't he in Year 8? - No. Year 10.
translation.es: - ¿No está en octavo? - No, está en décimo.

translation.en: I'm sure he's a nice guy but we actually want to be dece.
I know I was joking about being weak, but I'm definitely too weak for this.
translation.es: Sé que lo dije en chiste, pero sí soy muy debilucho para esto.

translation.en: Where is your can do attitude?
Just try. Tackle me, I won't dodge.
Come on, I bet you can do it.
Now, let's try again while I'm actually moving.
translation.es: Ahora probemos otra vez mientras me muevo.

translation.en: Yeah, you got it. One more time, come on.
translation.es: Sí, tú puedes. Una vez más, vamos.

translation.en: One, two, three, squeeze! One, two, three, squeeze!
Come on, mate. We've got practice.
- I'm trying to score a try. - Yeah.
And you try and run up to me.
You're wearing a coat? It's not even cold.
translation.es: ¿Llevas una chaqueta? Ni siquiera hace frío.

translation.en: God, what's your problem? I'm trying to be nice.
translation.es: ¿Qué te pasa? Te estoy tratando bien.

translation.en: I said I don't want to meet up anymore.
translation.es: Dije que ya no quiero verte.

translation.en: - Yeah, and I don't believe you. - What?
You're clearly just scared of getting caught.
translation.es: Es evidente que temes que nos descubran.

translation.en: Why would I be scared of getting caught?
Everyone in school already knows I'm gay.
translation.es: Toda la escuela sabe que soy gay.

translation.en: You're the one who's scared of getting caught.
translation.es: Tú eres el que teme que nos descubran.

translation.en: You can't even look at me when other people are around.
translation.es: Ni siquiera me miras cuando hay otras personas.

translation.en: Not to mention the fact that you have a girlfriend.
translation.es: Ni hablar de que tienes novia.

translation.en: Yeah. I've seen you with her at the school gate.
translation.es: Sí. Te vi con ella en la puerta de la escuela.

translation.en: Don't be angry at me for not wanting to come out yet.
translation.es: No te enojes porque no salí del clóset.

translation.en: If you're figuring stuff out, fine. Take your time.
translation.es: Si tienes dudas, está bien. Tómate tu tiempo.

translation.en: I would have been there for you.
Don't you think I, of all people, would understand you're figuring out your sexuality?
translation.es: ¿Crees que no sé cómo es tratar de resolver tu sexualidad?

translation.en: Then why are you angry at me?
I'm angry because you never even slightly cared about my feelings.
translation.es: Estoy enojado porque nunca te importó lo que yo siento.

translation.en: We only ever meet up when you want to.
translation.es: Solo nos vemos cuando tú quieres.

translation.en: Where you want to. When you feel like kissing a boy.
translation.es: Donde tú quieres. Cuando tienes ganas de besar a un chico.

translation.en: You don't care about me at all.
translation.es: Yo no te importo para nada.

translation.en: It's not like anyone else is going to want to go out with you, is it?
- I know you like me. - Stop it!
Charlie, I like you but I'm figuring stuff out.
translation.es: Charlie, me gustas, pero aún tengo dudas.

translation.en: What more do you want from me?
Did you hear all of that?
You seemed kind of like something was up while we were getting changed, so I…
translation.es: Me pareció que algo te pasaba cuando nos cambiábamos, así que…

translation.en: I wanted to check everything was okay.
translation.es: Vine a ver si todo estaba bien.

translation.en: You have nothing to be sorry about.
- I kind of want to say it. - Don't.
We'll get locked in if we stay here much longer.

translation.es: SÉ AMABLE NICK - ACTIVO HACE 15 MINUTOS SE SIGUEN EN INSTAGRAM
